post.body: i cried at the end .. i couldn't put into words how deep this movie was; it was just that sick.
the Lakers/Celtics commentator was whilin huh! haha .. had me weak! and lmao at the BIG trailer on TNT.. its still a flopper! :P
no! Haha
Lmaooooo and ROTF @ Chris Paul's "sexy pits" bwhahahaha!!!
Watchin my daily dose of Sports Center.. AGAIN. lol

Didn't realize til now that Ray Allen was 3-10 from the arc. Get a hint, drive the ball buddy.
Up watching re-runs of the NBA @ its best :)
Up late jammin to Brandy's "Human" and Keyshia Cole's "A Different Me" .. Some hot ish on both records!
feels like the biggest idiot after trying to use a Barnes & Nobles card at Borders. Glo, get it together!!!
